vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.21;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043); also called Aharah at 1Ch.8.1;
Another name of e.chi (אֵחִי "Ehi" H0278)
§ Aharah = "a following brother"
a son of Benjamin
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞哈拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "尾隨的兄弟"
便雅憫的兒子 (代上 8:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚哈拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "尾随的兄弟"
便雅悯的儿子 (代上 8:1)
